text: JUST IN: Senate President Vicente Sotto III says the chamber is expected to pass on Thursday the bill extending for another three months the validity of special powers granted to President Rodrigo Duterte to respond to the COVID-19 pandemic. https://t.co/sDo55hwVGt https://t.co/qQWjiFfnJ0
